name: white-apricorn
effect: May be given to Kurt in azalea town to produce a fast ball.
short_effect: Used to make a Fast Ball.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A white Apricorn. It doesn’t smell like anything.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A white Apricorn. It doesn’t smell like anything.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A white Apricorn. It doesn’t smell like anything.
